doc.after: The sound of the first Chinese character has been reconstructed as ho in Old Chinese The Chinese name for the Xiongnu was a pejorative term in itself as the characters have the meaning of fierce slave 24 The Chinese characters are pronounced as Xi ngn n in modern Mandarin Chinese
